trans-unit.source: The DsmlRequestDocument class enables you to build a DSML request payload, such as <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest"></xref>, <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest"></xref>, or <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La classe DsmlRequestDocument consente di compilare un payload di richiesta DSML, ad esempio <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest"> </xref>, <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest"> </xref>, o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: It contains zero or more <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> derived objects.
trans-unit.target: Contiene zero o più <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> oggetti derivati.

trans-unit.source: The user may add, delete, modify, and enumerate the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> before sending to the server.
trans-unit.target: L'utente può aggiungere, eliminare, modificare ed enumerare il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> prima dell'invio al server.

trans-unit.source: DsmlRequestDocument can be used with any DSML Binding classes to transport the document, such as <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: DsmlRequestDocument può essere utilizzato con qualsiasi classe DSML Binding per il trasporto del documento, ad esempio <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DsmlRequestDocument constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore DsmlRequestDocument crea un'istanza di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty request document.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore crea un documento di richiesta vuoto.

trans-unit.source: The Add method adds a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Add aggiunge un <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> oggetto alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> oggetto da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection at which the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object was added.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> raccolta in corrispondenza del quale il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> è stato aggiunto l'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: request is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: requestè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The Clear method removes all items from this collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Clear rimuove tutti gli elementi dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The Contains method determines whether this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection contains the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Contains determina se questo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> raccolta contiene l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object for which to search.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> oggetto da cercare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object is part of the collection; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> oggetto fa parte della raccolta. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, in caso contrario.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method copies the entire <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CopyTo copia l'intero <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> insieme in una matrice unidimensionale, iniziando dall'indice specificato della matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice unidimensionale che costituisce la destinazione degli elementi copiati dal <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of `value` where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero del `value` in cui ha inizio la copia.

trans-unit.source: The Count property contains the number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà Count contiene il numero di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> oggetti della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> oggetti della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The DocumentProcessing property contains one of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDocumentProcessing"></xref> that specifies how the elements of the collection are processed.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà DocumentProcessing contiene uno dei valori di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDocumentProcessing"> </xref> che specifica la modalità di elaborazione gli elementi della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDocumentProcessing"></xref> that specifies how the elements of the collection are processed.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDocumentProcessing"> </xref> che specifica la modalità di elaborazione gli elementi della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: value is an invalid enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: valueè un valore di enumerazione non valido.

trans-unit.source: The ErrorProcessing property contains one of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorProcessing"></xref> that specifies how errors are processed.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà ErrorProcessing contiene uno dei valori di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorProcessing"> </xref> che specifica la modalità di elaborazione degli errori.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorProcessing"></xref> that specifies how errors are processed.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorProcessing"> </xref> che specifica la modalità di elaborazione degli errori.

trans-unit.source: value is an invalid enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: valueè un valore di enumerazione non valido.

trans-unit.source: The GetEnumerator method returns an enumerator for the entire <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetEnumerator restituisce un enumeratore per l'intero <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>oggetto per l'intera raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Metodo IndexOf restituisce l'indice in base zero della prima occorrenza dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> oggetto di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object for which the index is returned.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> per il quale viene restituito l'indice dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The index value of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di indice dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> oggetto, se trovato; in caso contrario, -1.

trans-unit.source: value is reference ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The Insert method inserts the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection at the specified index.

trans-unit.source: The SyncRoot property contains an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà SyncRoot contiene un oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso al <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide synchronized versions of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument> using the SyncRoot property.
trans-unit.target: Classi derivate possono fornire versioni sincronizzate del <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>utilizzando la proprietà SyncRoot.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the SyncRoot of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>, not directly on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Il codice di sincronizzazione deve essere eseguite nella radice di sincronizzazione del <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>, non direttamente sulla <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo si garantisce il corretto funzionamento delle raccolte derivate da altri oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: In particolare, viene mantenuta la sincronizzazione con altri thread che potrebbero modificare contemporaneamente il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>oggetto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso a di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index value of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di indice dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> oggetto, se trovato; in caso contrario, -1.
